name: Cheesy Bacon Pretzel Dog Bites
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: Who needs a bun when you have a pretzel? Ooey gooey melted cheese, grilled onions, and bacon are drizzled over an all-beef frank served on a thin Pretzel Crisp®.
ingredients: 16  thin pretzel crackers (such as Snack Factory® Pretzel Crisps®)
directions: Melt butter in a small skillet over medium heat
Add onion; cook and stir until soft and deep brown in color, about 5 minutes
Bring a small saucepan of water to a boil
Add hot dogs; cook for 3 minutes
Cut each hot dog into 8 rounds
Pour nacho cheese sauce into the saucepan
Cook over low heat until cheese is heated through, 3 to 5 minutes
Arrange pretzel crackers on a serving platter; top each with 1 hot dog round
